name: LumiShade Spectra
description:
Experience a new level of eye protection and style with our cutting-edge sunglasses, designed to elevate your outdoor adventures and daily outings. The perfect blend of fashion and function, these shades feature advanced UV400 lenses that provide 100% protection against harmful UVA/UVB rays, ensuring your eyes are shielded while you soak up the sun. Whether you're lounging on the beach, hiking through scenic trails, or navigating through the city, stay confident knowing your vision is in safe hands.

Crafted with a lightweight yet durable frame, these sunglasses promise all-day comfort without compromising on durability.
